p:
For this study, annexin V-FITC/PI apoptosis detection kit was used; HCT-116 cells were stained with annexin V fluorescein isothiocyanate (FITC) and PI counter-stained. 1 × 10 5 HCT-116 cells were 48 h incubated with compound Vd or Ve, trypsinised, washed with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS), stained in the dark at 37 °C for 15 min. Then, analysed with a cytometer of FACS calibre flow
63 .
